typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Dates as string,
		Category as string,
		Descript as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Resolution as string,
		Address as string,
		X as string,
		Y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrigenDatos2
source(output(
		Dates as string,
		Category as string,
		Descript as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Resolution as string,
		Address as string,
		X as string,
		Y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OrigenDatos
source(output(
		Dates as string,
		Category as string,
		Descript as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Resolution as string,
		Address as string,
		X as string,
		Y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrigenAgrupado
OrigenDatos derive(Suma = X+Y) ~> CalcularSuma
OrigenDatos2 derive(Category = lower(Category)) ~> Minusculas
OrigenDatos derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
CalcularSuma derive(Category = lower(Category)) ~> Minus
OrigenAgrupado aggregate(groupBy(PdDistrict),
	Dates = count()) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Destino
Minusculas sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Destino2
Minus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['datosProcesados.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Destino3
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		Id as string,
		Dates as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Address as string,
		X as string,
		Y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['datosAgrupados.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> agrupado
